website_summaries.verdict: In addition to the air, this ball also includes handles and safety harnesses for your safey.
pros: Inflatable bubble ball made of eco-friendly PVC
Air cushioning, handles and safety harnesses provide three-way protection
Holds up out in the elements
cons: Some have arrived with leaks, but the company was very responsive to customer concerns

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, was exactly described in ad. VERY quick delivery. Also these things are super heavy, packaging was very durable to accommodate this fact. I would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great workout - laughing all the way
customer_reviews.text: Laughed so hard I couldn't get enough 'umph' to get myself back up. The kids thought it was hilarious to knock mom down. Worked for the whole family from ages 11-40+. Great option for cardio workout - run, bounce, roll, cartwheel. Had a blast. We ended up using a leaf blower to fill them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Reid

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun, way more durable then expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s been about 1.5 months inflated in the New England weather, not put away, left in yard. Neither has started to leak. Tons of fun, way more durable then expected. 120-275 pound people have used and not popped. Use has been contained to a level back yard without sharp objects but have endured jump kicks and abuse. One cheaper model Purchased from ocean state job lots for $50 is deflated from multiple leaks after 2 uses. I’m trying to save that one with flex seal
customer_reviews.author: Tayloraldrich

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these for my teenage kids. They appeared to be heavy duty and of high quality but as soon as inflated them, 3 of the four had audible air leaks and lost air pretty quickly. Within 10 minutes of light use three of the four were flat and unusable. I have requested a refund but have not received a response as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Gave these as a gift. Too big for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift. Too big for the 9 year old. Too small for the 19 year old and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great product yet with small defect.
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research on this thing and was pleased when it arrived and was larger and sturdier than what my son’s friends had gotten. That being said, it had a small hole in the seam. I requested a refund or replacement and was told by the company that they would replace it as long as I left a positive review. So, if they fulfill their promise everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Darienne

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love these and have had lots of fun wrestling each other on the front lawn in them. Both balls developed leaks after a few uses but the seller was responsive and remedied the issue for us. I would say that this 5 ft. size is mostly for kids older than 10 since they are pretty large but the bonus is that they can be used into the teens and adults can have fun with them too.
customer_reviews.author: kimgal

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, Zero customer service
customer_reviews.text: My son was given this set of bumper balls for Christmas. When the weather warmed up enough for him to play, one of the balls had a hole in it and would not inflate. I contacted the company twice and received no reply. Given the price of these I expected a better product and a better company. Disappointed all around.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Graham

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as soon as the Covid-19 havoc started. They have saved us from bored teenagers. They are super sturdy! I had a small issue and customer service answered all my emails almost immediately. I highly recommend this item and seller. Kudos for excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: J. Vidal

customer_reviews.title: A hilariously fun time for all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sons 9th birthday. They are incredible! The kids had so much fun. These balls really took a beating and they held up well! I highly recommend these!! ** I had an issue with getting one of the balls to stay filled. Customer service was great. They helped us with a few issues and checked back a few times to be sure we were happy. Make sure you read the instructions before using!! Very easy, but you need to read!
customer_reviews.author: Susan b

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and lots of laughs
customer_reviews.text: Great fun, I think the adults like it even more than the kids did. It took the kids a little to figure out the inner straps but afterwards were able to do themselves quickly. I purchased 2 and one did get a slow leak. Not yet tried to patch but hope it will work out ok as they are a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: A hit with 9 y/o boys!
customer_reviews.text: My kid LOVED this and all the neighborhood kids love it too. They jump on it, sit on it, roll it all over in my grassy yard and it's still in great condition. good quality and I am happy with the purchase even though it's spendy. You're getting what you pay for. I even played in it at 165 lbs 5"5"
customer_reviews.author: S. Ingersoll

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase these instead of renting from a company. Guest where able to enjoy them all day for under $400.00. Company wanted $600.00 for a few hours with instructors.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: BIG KID HIT
customer_reviews.text: THESE WERE A BLAST AT OUR OUTDOOR CAMPING BIRTHDAY PARTY. THE BIG KIDS WORE THEM SELF'S OUT, AND THE LITTLES WE JUST PUT THEM IN AND ROLLED THEM AROUND. STAYED INFLATED FOR HOURS AND DID NOT HAVE ONE LEAK OR HOLE. GOOD QUALITY VINYL, I WOULD RECOMMEND THEM TO ANY ONE WITH 5 YR OLDS AND UP. HEAVY DUTY.
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS E TATE

customer_reviews.title: The most fun you'll ever have
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a youth group event and they were the hit of the night. Even the parents were using them. Since then - my children (3 teenagers) have spent hours and hours with them. It made getting them off their electronics much easier. I was very surprised with the durability and quality of the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed these balls, but they weren’t very sturdy. One had a small hole and customer service worked with us and sent a new one. Less than 2 weeks later the replacement ball and the second ordinal ball are both slowly leaking. When we were able to use the balls they were a blast, but I probably wouldn’t purchase them again since they don’t last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2FourBoys

customer_reviews.title: So much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These balls were so much fun for the kids and adults. We used them on a family cabin weekend and they were fun and durable. We rolled in mud and tall weeds and grass. I would recommend these to anyone that would like many hours of outdoor fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome outdoor fun!
customer_reviews.text: We’re going on season two of these and still having a blast! Got these for our twins’ 9th birthday. They were a bit heavy then, but now closer to ten, much easier to manage. Super popular with all of our neighborhood kids and visitors. We deflated them over the winter and just blew them back up for the second go around. Still holding air tight and very bouncy. Kids pictured are ten-ish, fourth grade, average sized for reference.
customer_reviews.author: A. Battle

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. We had to deflate them so the kids would do another activity at a birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed pretty solid but strap broke very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The ball itsef seems pretty sturdy and does have a solid feel. The problem is that one of the shoulder straps broke on the second use. High school age boys were using them so it was a good test of the durability but still very disappointed that it failed so early.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: Tons o fun
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dad's 59th birthday and spent most of the day getting taken down but it was worth it. We laughed so hard there was tears. I do believe there is a leak in one but to be fair, we were hard on them! There were no patches in the box but should be easy enough to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Palella

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Shows adult in the picture in this ball. Way to small for an adult. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: More durable than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my neighbors little boy. The entire neighborhood enjoyed this for hours. It took a beating, but is still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: I did look a lot for these bumper balls, and finally found these. I did choice the 4'. I am very happy for the good quality of plastic, nice design and a good harness system. I am sure the kids will have a lot of fun with these bumper balls. Very quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the service I have received
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a set of inflatable bumper balls before Christmas. Both balls were damaged. Popsport is replacing damaged balls. Very happy with the service I have received.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an Easter gift for my daughter. Opened it up today to find no user manual and no repair kit. We do not have a compressor that has the right head to blow this up. Using a hair dryer to inflate it and it is losing air. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tom V. Vellis

customer_reviews.title: One ball was perfect, thank goodness I had two smaller ones from ...
customer_reviews.text: 2.5 RATING...ordered these for a party in advance. Silly me didn't inflate them right away and sure enough one of the balls is faulty. One ball was perfect, thank goodness I had two smaller ones from a previous purchase (different company) so we had 3 instead of 4 for the party. Couldn't even exchange it....i think I'll be more selective about online purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Roxxé

customer_reviews.title: Hamster ball
customer_reviews.text: It was the best ever gift said my grandkids. They spend hours playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: VW

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. High quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Very sturdy. High quality. I am using this at school with middle school and high school classes. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This ball is awesome!I gave it to my son for his 9th birthday and he loved it. It is made of heavy plastic and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: daniel Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: So fun, but already leaking!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for Christmas and were a huge hit. After using once, the red ball seems to have a slow leak. Please tell me there’s a way to replace or repair one of the balls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great but I have had to repair several holes in them. They work great, just puncture easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun To Play
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun item. It would have been nice to have directions on inflating them. Also reversing the flow on a shop vacuum is the quickest way to blow them up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are so much fun, I ordered this size for the grandkids ages six through 14 and I ordered larger bowls for the adults.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Customer service great as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas! Customer service great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Daws Diharce

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product works really really well ... teens had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great, used them multiple times with lots of people, I’ve had them since monday and so far nothing bad has happened to them.
customer_reviews.author: marvin lemus

customer_reviews.title: Real deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and fun!!! Great product from a great seller!!! Excellent communication!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these for a graduation party. They were so much fun! They did seem to gradually loose air and we had to keep adding air. One bubble’s handles broke.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Good customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Knocker ball came damaged and was replaced immediately. Kids love them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: hlt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I was vey pleased with the quality and durability of these balls. My family had so much fun!! Great product! I will recommend it to all my friends and family!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, very fun.
customer_reviews.text: The balls leaked when we got them, but the company was responsive and took care of the issue quickly. They are great fun.
customer_reviews.author: shelley hershner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, going to order two more. Our Youth group loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really thought this would be the perfect gift for our grandsons
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing experience! Really thought this would be the perfect gift for our grandsons. Not only did we not get the items, but by the time we found out we weren't getting them it was too late to order from anyone else or order anything else online in time for Christmas. In addition the routing number we were given was bogus. Only good thing was we got a fairly speedy refund!
customer_reviews.author: James McBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Both of my grandsons have a blast with this gift. It's heavy made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: automan

product_meta.title: Popsport Inflatable Bumper Ball Set 5FT Bubble Soccer Ball Suit 2 Pack 0.8mm Eco-Friendly PVC Zorb Ball Human Hamster Ball for Adults and Kids (5FT 2Pcs)
product_meta.description: Inflatable Bumper Ball Set 5FT Bubble Soccer Ball Suit 2 Pack 0. 8mm PVC Zorb Ball Human Hamster Ball Introduction: Bubble Football, or zorb football, is combining the best aspects of two completely different things to create a truly unique experience. The well-loved sport of football being played in giant bubbles is what creates the term bubble football - an interesting twist for you to try and play in, it becomes an incredibly hilarious activity to try out with all types of people whether it be friends, family or even complete strangers. You're to have a fantastic time! Item Specification: CE/TUV approved Material: 0. 8mm PVC Colour: Transparent with red point or blue point(The picture just for reference please see the actual product, thank you) Diameter: 5ft Weight: 24. 25lbs Maintain & Storage: Disinfect and clean the ball regularly. Check the ball before using. Although hard, pls avoid possibility of damage. After use, please remove sundries outside and inside the ball. Before packing, make sure the ball is clean and dry. Then store it in cool and dry place. About the repair guidance, please refer to the detailed instructions, if do not get it, please do not hesitate to contact us, thank you ! Package Content 2 X 5 FT Inflatable bumper ball
feature_bullets: Inflatable bumper ball colour: Transparent with red point or blue point; Material: 0. 8mm PVC; Diameter: 5ft; Weight: 24. 25lbs
Bubble soccer ball is made of PVC; CE/TUV approved, it indicate this ball is safe to play
Each ball comes with a 3-way safety system: air protection, handles to hold and safety harness/belts
The balls are inflated with air by an electric air pump and it just need takes about 90 seconds to inflate a ball
This zorb ball is a new & popular sports goods , it’s can be played on any open grass area, AstroTurf or indoor sports hall Schools, Leisure centres, Theme parks, party use
